00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Initial state factory specialisation for the istream class, creating an *
00013  * initial state instance from a filestream.                               *
00014  *                                                                         *
00015  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00016 
00017 #include <Camgen/static_conf.h>
00018 #include <Camgen/part_is.h>
00019 #include <Camgen/had_is.h>
00020 
00021 namespace Camorra

00024 
00025     template<class model_t,std::size_t N,class rng_t,class spacetime_t=typename model_t::spacetime_type>class initial_state_factory
00026     {
00027         public:
00028 
00029             /* Type definitions: */
00030 
00031             typedef initial_state<model_t,N> generator_type;
00032             typedef initial_states::type generator_tag;
00033 
00036 
00037             static generator_type* create_instance()
00038             {
00039                 bool q=true;
00040                 return create_instance(initial_state_type(),q);
00041             }
00042 
00044 
00045             static generator_type* create_instance(generator_tag tag,bool& backward_shat)
00046             {
00047                 LOG(warning)<<"Initial state type not defined for current spacetime type...returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00048                 return NULL;
00049             }
00050 
00052 
00053             static generator_type* create_instance(std::istream& is)
00054             {
00055                 std::string initflag;
00056                 do
00057                 {
00058                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00059                 }
00060                 while(initflag!="<isgen>" and !is.eof());
00061                 if(is.eof())
00062                 {
00063                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00064                     return NULL;
00065                 }
00066                 generator_type* result;
00067                 std::string is_type;
00068                 is>>is_type;
00069                 LOG(warning)<<"Initial state type "<<is_type<<" not recognised for current spacetime type...returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00070                 std::string endflag;
00071                 do
00072                 {
00073                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00074                 }
00075                 while(endflag!="</isgen>" and !is.eof());
00076                 return NULL;
00077             }
00078     };
00079

00082     template<class model_t,class rng_t>class initial_state_factory<model_t,1,rng_t,Minkowski_type>
00083     {
00084         public:
00085 
00086             /* Type definitions: */
00087 
00088             typedef initial_state<model_t,1> generator_type;
00089             typedef initial_states::type generator_tag;
00090 
00093 
00094             static generator_type* create_instance()
00095             {
00096                 return create_instance(initial_state_type(),true);
00097             }
00098 
00101 
00102             static generator_type* create_instance(generator_tag tag,bool backward_shat=false)
00103             {
00104                 if(tag==initial_states::partonic and !backward_shat)
00105                 {
00106                     return new partonic_is<model_t,1,Minkowski_type>;
00107                 }
00108                 return NULL;
00109             }
00110 
00112             
00113             static generator_type* create_instance(std::istream& is)
00114             {
00115                 std::string initflag;
00116                 do
00117                 {
00118                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00119                 }
00120                 while(initflag!="<isgen>" and !is.eof());
00121                 if(is.eof())
00122                 {
00123                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00124                     return NULL;
00125                 }
00126                 generator_type* result;
00127                 std::string is_type;
00128                 is>>is_type;
00129                 if(is_type=="partonic")
00130                 {
00131                     result=new partonic_is<model_t,1>;
00132                     result->load(is);
00133                 }
00134                 else
00135                 {
00136                     LOG(warning)<<"Initial state type "<<is_type<<" not recognised for current spacetime type...returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00137                     result=NULL;
00138                 }
00139                 std::string endflag;
00140                 do
00141                 {
00142                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00143                 }
00144                 while(endflag!="</isgen>" and !is.eof());
00145                 return result;
00146             }
00147     };

00152     template<class model_t,class rng_t>class initial_state_factory<model_t,2,rng_t,Minkowski_type>
00153     {
00154         public:
00155 
00156             typedef initial_state<model_t,2> generator_type;
00157             typedef initial_states::type generator_tag;
00158 
00161 
00162             static generator_type* create_instance()
00163             {
00164                 return create_instance(initial_state_type(),backward_shat_sampling());
00165             }
00166 
00168 
00169             static generator_type* create_instance(generator_tag tag,bool backward_shat)
00170             {
00171                 switch(tag)
00172                 {
00173                     case initial_states::partonic:
00174                         return new partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>;
00175                     case initial_states::eplus_eminus:
00176                         return new partonic_is<model_t,2,Minkowski_type>;
00177                     case initial_states::proton_proton:
00178                         if(backward_shat)
00179                         {
00180                             return new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(false,false);
00181                         }
00182                         else
00183                         {
00184                             return new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(false,false);
00185                         }
00186                     case initial_states::proton_antiproton:
00187                         if(backward_shat)
00188                         {
00189                             return new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(false,true);
00190                         }
00191                         else
00192                         {
00193                             return new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(false,true);
00194                         }
00195                     case initial_states::antiproton_proton:
00196                         if(backward_shat)
00197                         {
00198                             return new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(true,false);
00199                         }
00200                         else
00201                         {
00202                             return new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(true,false);
00203                         }
00204                     case initial_states::antiproton_antiproton:
00205                         if(backward_shat)
00206                         {
00207                             return new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(true,true);
00208                         }
00209                         else
00210                         {
00211                             return new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(true,true);
00212                         }
00213                     case initial_states::proton_proton_xx:
00214                         return new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(false,false);
00215                     case initial_states::proton_antiproton_xx:
00216                         return new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(false,true);
00217                     case initial_states::antiproton_proton_xx:
00218                         return new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(true,false);
00219                     case initial_states::antiproton_antiproton_xx:
00220                         return new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(true,true);
00221                     default:
00222                         return NULL;
00223                 }
00224             }
00225 
00227             
00228             static generator_type* create_instance(std::istream& is)
00229             {
00230                 std::string initflag;
00231                 do
00232                 {
00233                     std::getline(is,initflag);
00234                 }
00235                 while(initflag!="<isgen>" and !is.eof());
00236                 if(is.eof())
00237                 {
00238                     LOG(warning)<<"End of file reached before initial data are read..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00239                     return NULL;
00240                 }
00241                 generator_type* result;
00242                 std::string is_type;
00243                 is>>is_type;
00244                 if(is_type=="partonic")
00245                 {
00246                     result=new partonic_is<model_t,2>;
00247                     result->load(is);
00248                 }
00249                 else if(is_type=="pp_xx")
00250                 {
00251                     result=new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t>(false,false);
00252                     result->load(is);
00253                 }
00254                 else if(is_type=="ppbar_xx")
00255                 {
00256                     result=new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t>(false,true);
00257                     result->load(is);
00258                 }
00259                 else if(is_type=="pbarp_xx")
00260                 {
00261                     result=new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t>(true,false);
00262                     result->load(is);
00263                 }
00264                 else if(is_type=="pbarpbar_xx")
00265                 {
00266                     result=new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t>(true,true);
00267                     result->load(is);
00268                 }
00269                 else if(is_type=="pp_sy")
00270                 {
00271                     result=new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t>(false,false);
00272                     result->load(is);
00273                 }
00274                 else if(is_type=="ppbar_sy")
00275                 {
00276                     result=new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t>(false,true);
00277                     result->load(is);
00278                 }
00279                 else if(is_type=="pbarp_sy")
00280                 {
00281                     result=new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t>(true,false);
00282                     result->load(is);
00283                 }
00284                 else if(is_type=="pbarpbar_sy")
00285                 {
00286                     result=new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t>(true,true);
00287                     result->load(is);
00288                 }
00289                 else if(is_type=="pp_y")
00290                 {
00291                     result=new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t>(false,false);
00292                     result->load(is);
00293                 }
00294                 else if(is_type=="ppbar_y")
00295                 {
00296                     result=new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t>(false,true);
00297                     result->load(is);
00298                 }
00299                 else if(is_type=="pbarp_y")
00300                 {
00301                     result=new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t>(true,false);
00302                     result->load(is);
00303                 }
00304                 else if(is_type=="pbarpbar_y")
00305                 {
00306                     result=new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t>(true,true);
00307                     result->load(is);
00308                 }
00309                 else
00310                 {
00311                     LOG(warning)<<"Initial state type "<<is_type<<" not recognised for current spacetime type...returning NULL."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00312                     result=NULL;
00313                 }
00314                 std::string endflag;
00315                 do
00316                 {
00317                     std::getline(is,endflag);
00318                 }
00319                 while(endflag!="</isgen>" and !is.eof());
00320                 return result;
00321             }
00322     };
00323 }
